edge: Frankenstein creates a monster by putting together parts of corpses and reanimating them. Horrified by his creation, Frankenstein tries to destroy it, but the monster survives and murders his wife Elizabeth. Frankenstein chases it to the Arctic, but he succumbs to the cold weather.
The monster's creation leads to the death of Frankenstein's wife Elizabeth. The monster is pursued by demons, but survives and eventually buries Frankenstein in the Arctic.
For the next two hundred years, Adam lives apart from society, killing any demon that pursues him and hiding from them. During the fight, a police officer is killed.

Deciding to rejoin society in the modern-day, Adam looks for and confronts a group of demons. During the fight, a police officer is killed. This causes Adam to be summoned by the gargoyles once more and they decide to imprison him as punishment.

Leonore explains that they were created by the Archangel Michael to battle demons on Earth and protect humanity. She names the creature 'Adam' and invites him to join them, but he declines and chooses to depart.
The gargoyles were created by the Archangel Michael to battle demons on Earth and protect humanity. They invite Adam to join them in this mission.

The gargoyles give Adam baton-like weapons to protect himself, as more demons will come after him. The weapons allow him to 'descend' demons (destroying their bodies and trapping their souls in Hell) as they have the symbol of the Gargoyle Order carved on them.
